articles.description: Dipika Pallikal   Joshna Chinappa WIN Women s Doubles title of Squash World Doubles Championships after stunning 2nd seeds Sarah-Jane Perry Alison Waters 2-1 in Final. pic.twitter.com ls85wDwxUY — India_AllSports (@India_AllSports) April 9, 2022   Just happy …
articles.content: Less than six months after giving birth to twins, Dipika Pallikal made the mother of all comebacks on Saturday when she teamed up with brother-in-law Saurav Ghosal and longtime teammate Joshna Chinap… [+3699 chars]
